sentences.en: Auto - segmentation of poor quality blood corpuscle image was achieved.
sentences.cn: 结果:实现了低质量血细胞图像的自适应分割.

sentences.en: Cast preparation of the glomerular vessels ( glomerulus ) in a renal corpuscle.
sentences.cn: 铸造编制肾小球船只 ( 肾小球 ) 在肾小体.

sentences.en: Each corpuscle singing in its capillary hates you.
sentences.cn: 在毛细血管里欢歌的血球恨你.

sentences.en: He called this negative elemental particle the corpuscle.
sentences.cn: 他称之为这个负基本粒子叫做,微粒。

sentences.en: Know thyself , then, to be as a corpuscle, as a facet, as a characteristic, as a love, in the body of God.
sentences.cn: 知道你自己在上帝的身体里成为一个微粒、一个小面、一种特性、一点爱。

sentences.en: Nephron included renal corpuscle, proximal convoluted tubule ( PCT ), medullary loop , distal convoluted tubule ( DCI ), and connected tubule.
sentences.cn: 肾单位包括肾小球 、 近曲小管 、 髓袢 、 远曲小臂和连接小管5部分.

sentences.en: Objective : To investigate the mechanism of the effect of Lvjao corpuscle in nourishing blood.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨驴胶补血冲剂的补血机制.

sentences.en: Objective To observe the ultrastructural variation of epithelial cell in the development of the rat corpuscle.
sentences.cn: 目的观察大鼠肾小体发育过程中上皮细胞超微结构的形态变化规律.

sentences.en: Objective To prepare the liquefier of KX - 21 automatic digital corpuscle count instrument.
sentences.cn: 目的研制适用于KX-21全自动电子血细胞计数仪的稀释液.

sentences.en: The nanometre corpuscle or nanometre material has its own special properties and new rules.
sentences.cn: 纳米微粒及纳米材料具有独特的性质和新的规律。

trans.tran_en: one of the red or white cells in the blood
